meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2058.

td.p: Mack Owen, a university professor originally from Camilla, Georgia
Leon Jackson, a court clerk from Elmhurst, New York
Helen Druva, a housewife from Alexandria, Virginia

tr.td: COLONIES
MOVIE STARS
TRANSPORTATION
FICTIONAL SENIORS
(Alex: How appropriate!)
COLORS
COFFEE, TEA OR MEAD?
